title: Amazon API Gateway REST API to AWS Lambda
description: This pattern creates an Amazon API Gateway REST API and an AWS Lambda function.

introBox.headline: How it works
text: This pattern deploys an Amazon API Gateway REST API API with a default route and basic CORS configuration. The default route is integrated with an AWS Lambda function written in Rust. The function logs the incoming API event and context object to an Amazon CloudWatch Logs log group and returns basic information about the event to the caller.
See the GitHub repo for detailed testing instructions.

authors.headline: Presented by Daniele Frasca
authors.name: Daniele Frasca
authors.bio: I am Daniele Frasca serverless enthusiast. I build and architect serverless applications at scale.
